issue.title: Delay between ignition visualization and ros topics

content.raw: @{557058:095b1e12-74ed-4e20-b44f-2f0745b616e0} @{5cf75629ff02b50ea27b2817} Can you guys publish prebuilt docker image with this stuff? We can use docker pull to get it. It can simplify the whole workflow because we will be using the exact stuff you have tested & released. This way we have way to many moving parts that can go wrong.
content.html: @Nate Koenig @Alfredo Bencomo Can you guys publish prebuilt docker image with this stuff? We can use docker pull to get it. It can simplify the whole workflow because we will be using the exact stuff you have tested & released. This way we have way to many moving parts that can go wrong.
